@graph.name: Roasted Chickpeas - Vegan Heaven

@graph.headline: Roasted Chickpeas

@graph.name: Roasted Chickpeas
@graph.description: These roasted chickpeas make such a delicious and healthy snack! They're perfectly seasoned, a bit spicy, and super easy to prepare. They're perfect for parties, snacking in front of the TV, road trips, and so much more!

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the canned chickpeas. Then dry them really well using a clean dishtowel. Just gently roll them between the dishtowel. You could also use paper towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the canned chickpeas. Then dry them really well using a clean dishtowel. Just gently roll them between the dishtowel. You could also use paper towel.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, toss the chickpeas with olive oil. We'll add the spices after baking because they have a tendency to burn. So don't worry about them for now.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium bowl, toss the chickpeas with olive oil. We'll add the spices after baking because they have a tendency to burn. So don't worry about them for now.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Spread the chickpeas on the baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Spread the chickpeas on the baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Then take the chickpeas out of the oven and place them in the bowl you used before. Add the spices and toss well until the chickpeas are coated evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Then take the chickpeas out of the oven and place them in the bowl you used before. Add the spices and toss well until the chickpeas are coated evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Return them to the baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes until they're browned and crunchy.
recipeInstructions.name: Return them to the baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes until they're browned and crunchy.

@graph.keywords: how to make roasted chickpeas, roasted chickpeas, roasted chickpeas recipe
